overview: GitHub admins can now manage access to Copilot agent mode for IDE via the Copilot policies page on github.com.

detailed_explanation.title: Overview
bullets: GitHub admins can now manage access to Copilot agent mode for IDE via the Copilot policies page on github.com.

detailed_explanation.title: Whatâ€™s changed
bullets: To provide better governance, Copilot policies now allow for enabling and disabling access to Copilot agent mode in the IDE for enterprises and organizations.

Prior to this update, Copilot agent mode in the IDE was enabled for all users. To prevent disruption, the new policy has shipped with a default setting of Enabled . To modify this setting, please visit the AI Controls tab for your enterprise or Copilot policies tab for your organization.

detailed_explanation.title: Learn more and provide feedback
bullets: For more information on Copilot policies please visit our documentation page for Copilot policies .

insights: Learn more and provide feedback For more information on Copilot policies please visit our documentation page for Copilot policies .
